author: jeffrey.downard
title: Spaceship Earth DAO
description: We've only have one earth. We need to treat it with respect. How to use DAOs to support social and environmental sustainability?
solution: Create a model DAO as a nonprofit that supports projects to buy carbon credits, conserve rainforest habitat and promote social justice.
experience: Environmental and social ethics research and teaching, environmental law, business law, business systems consultant, full stack developer.
